title: Foredestined
description: In Colorado, 16-year-old Rosalie Danforth prepares for a cruise with her mother, even though her father reinforces a warning for a predicted global disaster. Just before Rosalie and her mother are to return home, the predictions prove true. Severely injured, Rosalie awakens to a destroyed world where she begins a life with strangers and a world with no technology or governmental rule and only pockets of survivors globally.
author: Amy E. Zajac
